INSERT INTO t_template_component ( template_id, pid, component_id, `name`, introduction, is_required, `sequence`, `type`, data_origin, origin_identify, field_flag, is_show, is_disabled, is_open, t.is_not_match_show_tips, t.not_match_tips, t.is_not_match_jump, t.not_match_jump_url ) VALUES
( #{item.templateId}, #{item.pid}, #{item.componentId}, #{item.name}, #{item.introduction}, #{item.required}, #{item.sequence}, #{item.type}, #{item.dataOrigin}, #{item.originIdentify}, #{item.fieldFlag}, #{item.show}, #{item.disabled}, #{item.open}, #{item.notMatchShowTips}, #{item.notMatchTips}, #{item.notMatchJump}, #{item.notMatchJumpUrl} )
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.pid, t.component_id as componentId, t.template_id as templateId, t.name, t.introduction, t.is_required as required, t.type, t.data_origin as dataOrigin, t.origin_identify as originIdentify, t.field_flag as fieldFlag, t.is_show as `show`, t.is_disabled as disabled, t.is_open as `open`, t1.is_switch_btn as switchBtn, t1.code, t.is_not_match_show_tips notMatchShowTips, t.not_match_tips, t.is_not_match_jump notMatchJump, t.not_match_jump_url FROM t_template_component t INNER JOIN t_component t1 ON t.component_id = t1.id where t.template_id = #{templateId} and t.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY t.sequence
